cmp: 句 ((a measure word, for sentences or lines of verse)/sentence)
mng: to hook, to sew, to crochet, hook, check mark or tick, window catch

exm.mng: to hook, to sew, to crochet, hook, check mark or tick, window catch
hook (on which to hang sth), to couple, to link together, to establish contact with, hook, coupling links (e.g. between two railway coaches)
to take the bait
hook
to cut ties, to disconnect, out of touch
suspended hook, hanging hook, hanger
fishhook
to tick, to check, tick mark, check mark
barb, bicycle kick, or overhead kick (football)
to hook onto, to hitch onto, to catch onto
pinky swear
to crochet
leptospirosis
exm.pyn: gōu duān luó xuán tǐ bìng

exm.mng: variant of 勾心鬥角|勾心斗角[gou1 xin1 dou4 jiao3]
Jiang Ziya is fishing, if you want take the hook (idiom, refers to early sage 薑子牙|姜子牙 fishing with no bait and the hook above the water); to put one's head in the noose
exm.pyn: tài gōng diào yú , yuàn zhě shàng gōu

exm.mng: Jiang Ziya is fishing, if you want it, take the hook (idiom, refers to early sage 薑子牙|姜子牙 fishing with no bait and the hook above the water); to put one's head in the noose
exm.pyn: Jiāng tài gōng diào yú , yuàn zhě shàng gōu

exm.mng: variant of 魚鉤|鱼钩[yu2 gou1]
to explore, to investigate, to audit (accounts, books etc)
vertical stroke with a hook at the end (in Chinese characters)
a hook, to make contact with sb
